definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be weak, languish (cf. Ar. 0’amala hope, expect).

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. f. [[מָה אֲמֻלָה]] [[לִכָּתֵךְ]] how weak is thy heart! Ez Eze 16:30 (but < Co [[מַה־לִּי וְלִבְרִיתֵח]]);

definitions.title: Pu‘l.
definitions.body: Pf. [[אֻמְלַל]] Joe 1:10 +; [[אֻמְלְלָה]] Is 33:9 +; [[אֻמְלְלוּ]] Je 14:2 etc.;—be or grow feeble, languish; of loss of fertility (woman) 1Sa 2:5, Je 15:19; of fisherman whose trade fails Is 19:8 ‖[[אנה]], [[אבל]]); in genl. of inhab. of smitten land Ho 4:3 (‖[[תֶּאֱבַל הָאָרֶץ]]); Is 24:4 cf. infr. usually subj. inanim., personif.; [[שַׁדְמוֹת]] [[חֶשְׁבּוֹן]] Is 16:8; cf. Na 1:4, Na 1:4; [[תֵּבֵל]] Is 24:4 (‖[[נבל]], [[אבל]]); [[אֶרֶץ]] Is 33:9 (‖[[אבל]]); subj. [[גֶּפֶן]] Is 24:7 (‖[[אָבַל תִּירוֹשׁ]]; [[יִצְּהָר]] Joe 1:10 (‖[[שׁדד]], [[אבל]], [[הובישׁ]]; kindred subj.); [[תְּאֵנׇה]] v:Joe 1:12 (‖[[הַגֶּפֶן הוֹבִישָׁה]]); [[שְׁעָרִים]] Je 14:2 (‖[[אָֽבְלָה]] [[יְהוּדָה]]); cf. La 2:8 [[וַיַּאֲבֶל־חֵל וְחוֹמָה יַחְדָּו אֻמְלָָלוּ]].
